channel.title: Adding ge to a 317 error! [unsolved]
channel.description: Okay so i recently tryed to add ge into my source, and lucky me, i got a compiling error...lol anyone help? :| [code]client.java:18375: illegal start of expression public int gewaitTimer = 0, checkgewaittimer = 10; ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Adding ge to a 317 error! [unsolved]
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“kickyamom50, post:4, topic:354849”]That just made it worse… now i got this

client.java:18375: illegal start of expression public int gewaitTimer = 0; ^ client.java:18376: illegal start of expression public int checkgewaittimer = 10; ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
I changed it back but now i’m back to the original 1 error
Here is the whole code:

if (checkingge && checkgewaittimer == 0)//refreshes ge { checkge(); checkgewaittimer = 10; } if (ge.itemSellerMoney.contains(playerName)) { for (int i = 0; i < ge.itemSellerMoney.size(); i++) { if (ge.itemSellerMoney.get(i) == playerName) { if (gewaitTimer == 0) { sM("You have money to collect! Type ::collect!"); gewaitTimer = 30; } } } } if (gewaitTimer > 0 ) gewaitTimer--; if (checkgewaittimer >0) checkgewaittimer--; public int gewaitTimer = 0, checkgewaittimer = 10;[/quote]
you’re not declaring them right.

Read full topic
